text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In order to help Taiki Shuttle further<n>hone her skills, we've
joined summer<n>camp.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Across the line!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Whew. Was that thelast item on the training schedule?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Okay! There's actually something I'd<n>like us to do together.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
What goes hand in hand with summer<n>camp? That's right—a
barbecue! I've<n>been itchin' to throw one for the<n>longest
time!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
I was so fired up, I scoured every<n>website and book I could
find. There<n>are lots of delicious foods out there in<n>nature!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
So let's gather up some of those<n>super fresh ingredients
and have a<n>barbecue together!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She should really be resting after her<n>training session, but
those sparkling<n>eyes make it hard to turn her down.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Woohoo, good! ♪ Thank ya! Then<n>let's get going!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Hm-hm-hmm... ♪

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Make sure to look both ways, now.<n>According to one of the
books I read,<n>there should be mushrooms growing<n>around
here.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
I bet they're even fresher than the<n>ones ya find at the
grocery store. So<n>let's get lookin'!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Ooh! Look over there, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Look at those colorful red and white<n>spots! Could that be
one of those<n>legendary mushrooms that turns ya<n>into a
giant when ya eat it?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Can't take your eyes off it, huh? Do<n>ya really wanna eat it
that badly?<n>Okay, say no more! I'll go get it!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Poisonous?! Oh, that's a real shame.<n>It looked so cool...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Oh! Then how 'bout that one? The<n>rainbowy coloring makes
it look really<n>tasty!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Wondering if she actually just<n>wanted to pick mushrooms, I
continue<n>to follow Taiki as she bounces<n>happily through
the trees.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Eventually, we emerge to find<n>ourselves on a sandy beach.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Oh! We found the ocean, Trainer! Ya<n>know what that
means—shellfish and<n>sea urchins galore! Let's go!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Before I can stop her, Taiki races out<n>into the water.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Whew! I found a whole slew of<n>shellfish! I'm sure there are
some<n>you'll like in here!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Anywhoo, please follow me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It may be summer, but she could still<n>catch a cold running
around soaking<n>wet like that.
choice_data_list: Couldn't we just buy the rest?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
No! They gotta be fresh! Only the most<n>delicious ingredients
will do!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Now, let's continue the hunt! Here we<n>go!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Wow! Look, Trainer—a crop field!<n>We've stumbled on a real
treasure<n>trove here! Japanese veggies are<n>downright
delicious!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
There just happens to be somebody<n>out pluckin' the
produce right now.<n>I'm gonna ask if he'll share his haul<n>if
we lend a hand!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Let's go! Go, go, gooo!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Up we go... Whew. Okay, mister! I<n>finished pulling all the
weeds!

text_block_list.name: Farmer
text_block_list.text:
Hoo boy! Thanks for the help, you<n>two. Go ahead and help
yourself to<n>those vegetables I promised.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Yay, thank ya! Hehe. Which veggies<n>would ya like, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Once we've decided, it'll finally be<n>time for the grand finale!
choice_data_list: Isn't it a little late to start setting up?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Nah, it'll be no problem—trust me!<n>Come on, Trainer! Hurry
up and make<n>your picks!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After selecting my preferred<n>vegetables at Taiki's urging, I
follow<n>her to our next location.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Welcome to our very own happy<n>barbecue party! ☆

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There on the beach is a fully equipped<n>barbecue set,
seemingly borrowed<n>from the summer camp facilities.
choice_data_list: W-when did you do all this?!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: The truth is, I woke up bright and<n>early to get it ready!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
So I sure am glad ya didn't say no<n>when I asked ya to help
me hunt for<n>ingredients.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: We ended up getting our hands on abunch of fresh ingredients, so thisbarbecue's sure to be a special and delicious affair!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Please accept this as a little gift from<n>me to you!
choice_data_list: So this was all for my sake...
So this was all for my sake...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Hehe. Thank ya for all your help,<n>Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Whenever I'm feeling lonely, you're<n>always there for me.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
So even though I'm away from my<n>family, my days are full
of smiles!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: And also, I realized something. You're<n>not just my trainer...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: You're my precious Japanese family!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
That's why I want ya to experience a<n>bona fide barbecue,
just like I used to<n>have with my family back home!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Hehe. Yes! Operation Surprise was a<n>great success!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
All right, Trainer! Tell me what ya<n>wanna start with, and
leave the rest to<n>me!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
I gathered each and every ingredient<n>just for you! They're
all here for ya to<n>enjoy!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
I'll pour my heart into grillin' em up<n>real nice, so be sure to
eat your fill!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Soon, both my stomach and heart are<n>full to bursting from
Taiki's barbecue.
